## IMetricsPluginOptions.defaultMetrics property

Default prom-client metrics config. Collect prometheus recommended and node.js specific metrics like event loop lag.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
defaultMetrics?: IDefaultMetricsConfig;
```
